Constituent.Name: Nitrogen
Constituent.Description: Total Nitrogen Model for the Chesapeake Bay Watershed reported in SIR 2011-5167

Source.Name: CBP Point Source
Source.Description: Total nitrogen from point sources in kilograms per year. Chesapeake Bay Program (CBP) Total Nitrogen, 2002 primarily municipal wastewater.

Source.Name: Fertilizer and Fixation
Source.Description: Commercial fertilizer applied to all crops, in addition to crop fixation.

Source.Name: Total Manure
Source.Description: Manure from confined and unconfined sources, distributed on rowcrops and pasture defined by 2001 National Land Cover Dataset (NLCD).

Source.Name: Total Nitrogen Air Deposition
Source.Description: Total inorganic wet deposition from the National Atmospheric Deposition Program (NADP), 2002.

Source.Name: Total Urban Area
Source.Description: Total Urban Area defined by 2001 National Land Cover Dataset (NLCD).

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. CBP Point Source Total nitrogen from point sources in kilograms per year. Chesapeake Bay Program (CBP) Total Nitrogen, 2002 primarily municipal wastewater. Fertilizer and Fixation Commercial fertilizer applied to all crops, in addition to crop fixation. Total Manure Manure from confined and unconfined sources, distributed on rowcrops and pasture defined by 2001 NLCD. Total Nitrogen Air Deposition Total inorganic wet deposition from the National Atmospheric Deposition Program (NADP), 2002. Total Urban Area Total Urban Area defined by 2001 National Land Cover Dataset (NLCD).
